name: $user
desc: The list was sorted by the system. The criteria the user used are not specified; define additional codes to specify a particular order (or use other defined codes).

name: $system
desc: The list is sorted by the data of the event. This can be used when the list has items which are dates with past or future events.

name: $event-date
desc: The list is sorted by the date the item was added to the list. Note that the date added to the list is not explicit in the list itself.

name: $entry-date
desc: The list is sorted by priority. The exact method in which priority has been determined is not specified.

name: $priority
desc: The list is sorted alphabetically by an unspecified property of the items in the list.

name: $alphabetic
desc: The list is sorted categorically by an unspecified property of the items in the list.

name: $category
desc: The list is sorted by patient, with items for each patient grouped together.
